        public double x

      • y

      • diameter

    • 构造器详细资料

      • Circle

        public Circle(double x,
              double y,
              double diameter)
        draws the circle from the center and takes the diameter instead of the radius.
        参数:
        x - is the X coordinate of the origin of the circle.
        y - is the Y coordinate of the origin of the circle.
        diameter - is the diameter of the circle (not the raidus)

      • Circle

        public Circle()
        sets the fields of the methods to defult 0 all the pre and post conditions apply to this constructor

    • 方法详细资料

      • getPerimeter

        public double getPerimeter()
        returns Perimeter
        返回:
        Returns the Perimeter of the circle using the equation pi*d

      • getArea

        public double getArea()
        returns the area of the circle.
        返回:
        using the forumala r squared*pi to calculate and return the area

      • isPointInside

        public boolean isPointInside(double px,
                             double py)
        checks if the point is inside
        参数:
        px - is the x cordinate of the point user want to check
        py - is the y cordinate of the point user want to check
        返回:
        returns a boolean by checking if the distance of the point to the circle is smaller than the radius of the circle

      • isCircleBigger

        public boolean isCircleBigger(Circle circle)
        参数:
        circle - compares if a circle is bigger than the circle of this object.
        返回:
        a boolean that shows if this circle is bigger than the other.

      • topPointCircleX

        public double topPointCircleX()
        converts the x cordinate to the top left instead of origin
        返回:
        returns the top left x cordinate

      • topPointCircleY

        public double topPointCircleY()
        same us topPointCircleX but return the y cordinate.
        返回:
        returns y top left point.

      • draw

        public void draw(processing.core.PApplet marker)
        draws the circle
        参数:
        marker - is the pApplet that you need to path in order for the method to work
